data.scheme_name: Agriculture and Processed Foods Export Promotion Scheme of APEDA  - Development of Export Infrastructure  - Cable handling system for banana and other crops  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides assistance upto 40% of the total cost subject to a ceiling of Rs. 200 lakhs for developing Cable handling system for banana and other crops.
data.eligibility: All APEDA registered Exporters are eligible to apply for assistance.
data.conditions:
1. The cable car system shall cover all horticulture crops. 
2. Detailed appraisal note, specific to the scheme, is required. 
3. APEDA shall charge processing fee (as approved by DoC) on disbursed amount @ 5% + GST (non-refundable under any circumstances) thereon.
data.beneficiaries: All APEDA registered Exporters are eligible to apply for assistance.
data.prerequisites:
1. The cable car system shall cover all horticulture crops. 
  2. Detailed appraisal note, specific to the scheme, is required. 
  3. APEDA shall charge processing fee (as approved by DoC) on disbursed amount @ 5% + GST (non-refundable under any circumstances) thereon.
data.nodal_agency: Agricultural and Processed Foods Products Export Development Authority (APEDA)
data.context: This scheme is introduced for growth of agro-industries and export of agricultural products in the value chain. The scheme component covers both fresh produce and processed food products.
data.objective: The primary objective of APEDA is to undertake the development and promotion of export of mentioned products.
data.description: Scheme provides assistance upto 40% of the total cost subject to a ceiling of Rs. 200 lakhs for developing Cable handling system for banana and other crops.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://apeda.gov.in/apedawebsite/miscellaneous/Tender.htm
data.funding_facilitator: Agricultural and Processed Foods Products Export Development Authority (APEDA)
data.funding_mechanism:
The grant-in-aid will be released in three installments of 40%, 40% and 20% as per follows : 

  1. 1st installment of 40% of the approved grant under the scheme will be released after receipt of valid bank guarantee. 
  2. 2nd installment of 40% of the approved grant will be released after Utilization of first installment of grant released. 
  3. Final instalment of 20% of the approved grant will be released on commissioning of the project along with signing of O&M contract with the end users.
data.additional_info: The applicant shall submit monthly export returns on APEDA website regularly.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. In-Principal Approval (IPA) issued by APEDA
2. PAN Card
3. Import Export Code
4. Registration-Cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) Certificate generated online
5. Quotation/proforma invoice /invoices from suppliers of equipment / packaging boxes/ advertisement /consultants (feasibility study/ISO/HACCP) etc.
6. Other relevant document (as required)
